A '''potion of Slow Falling''' is a potion that provides [[Slow Falling]] when used.

=== Brewing ===

|showvariants=1

|showvariants=1
}}

|base3 = Potion of Slow Falling Extended

|Splash Potion of Slow Falling

|ingredients = [[Gunpowder]] +<br> '''Potion of Slow Falling'''

{{Brewing
